mapper.sql: question_portrait_id, question_portrait_name, create_time, update_time, create_user_id, is_delete, order, survey_table_id, question_crosswise_id, answer_type
mapper.insert: insert into question_units (question_portrait_id, question_portrait_name, create_time, update_time, create_user_id, is_delete, order, survey_table_id, question_crosswise_id, answer_type) values (#{questionPortraitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{questionPortraitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{order,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{surveyTableId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{questionCrosswiseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{answerType,jdbcType=TINYINT})

question_portrait_id,

mapper.update:
update question_units
question_portrait_name = #{questionPortraitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
order = #{order,jdbcType=TINYINT},
survey_table_id = #{surveyTableId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
question_crosswise_id = #{questionCrosswiseId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
answer_type = #{answerType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where question_portrait_id = #{questionPortraitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update question_units set question_portrait_name = #{questionPortraitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, order = #{order,jdbcType=TINYINT}, survey_table_id = #{surveyTableId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, question_crosswise_id = #{questionCrosswiseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, answer_type = #{answerType,jdbcType=TINYINT} where question_portrait_id = #{questionPortraitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select qp.question_portrait_id, qp.question_portrait_name, answers.answer_id, answers.answer_text, answers.answer_val, qcpa.answer_type from question_units qp left join question_unit_answer_maps qcpa on qp.question_portrait_id=qcpa.question_portrait_group left join answers on qcpa.answer_id=answers.answer_id where qp.question_crosswise_id=#{questionCrosswiseId}
